item.title: Trump administration hit with over 100 lawsuits since inauguration
item.description: More than 100 federal lawsuits have been filed since the inauguration, taking aim at Trump administration policies.

item.title: Trump preparing executive order to dissolve Department of Education: Sources
item.description: President Trump is expected to direct his secretary of education to dissolve the Department of Education by executive order this week, sources said.
